name: claude-code-utils
title: Claude Code Utils
description: Browse, search, and manage your Claude Code conversations. Access sent/received messages, create snippets, and view command shortcuts.
author: marcospmail

commands.name: create-snippet
commands.title: Create Snippet
commands.description: Create a new reusable code snippet

commands.name: browse-snippets
commands.title: Browse Snippets
commands.description: View, search, and manage your saved code snippets

commands.name: received-messages
commands.title: Received Messages
commands.description: Browse messages received from Claude with AI-powered search

commands.name: sent-messages
commands.title: Sent Messages
commands.description: Browse messages you sent to Claude

commands.name: cheatsheet
commands.title: Commands Cheat Sheet
commands.description: Quick reference for all Claude Code commands and keyboard shortcuts

commands.name: browse-agents
commands.title: Browse Agents
commands.description: View and manage your Claude Code agents from ~/.claude/agents

commands.name: browse-commands
commands.title: Browse Commands
commands.description: View and manage your Claude Code commands from ~/.claude/commands

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
